ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: This 3D Chart demo shows how to change 3D Viewport orientation to have either Z-Axis or Y-Axis pointing upwards
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates the properties of the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Viewport3D.html']Viewport3D[/url] class which allows configuring 3D scene globally.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
[b]Click 'ZAxisUp' on the left to switch Viewport 3D orientation from Y-Axis up to Z-Axis up.[/b]
